entry.title: Boli Bolingoli away
entry.summary:
Photo by Ian MacNicol/Getty Images
The main news from Celtic Park today was the unsurprising exit of Boli Bolingoli, the man who caused grown men to put his surname on their twitter display names back in 2019.
I Boli Bolingoli tekende voor twee seizoenen en komt de linkerflank van KVM versterken ❤️Meer info https://t.co/GtKClzCuaH#trotsoponzekleuren #Boliisnekakker— KV Mechelen (@kvmechelen) July 12, 2022
The left back joined KV Mechelen earlier today in a permanent deal. The writing has indeed been on the wall for the much maligned Belgian, who incurred the wrath of Neil Lennon, the entire support and of course the wonderful Scottish Government in August 2020 after THAT flight to Spain.
Celtic boss Neil Lennon says there’s been no explaination from Boli Bolingoli about why he flew to Spain for an overnight. “I’m absolutely livid, it’s a total betrayal of trust” pic.twitter.com/eLZivwB35w— Clyde 1 Superscoreboard (@ClydeSSB) August 11, 2020
Nicola Sturgeon even gave Scottish Football the dreaded yellow card!
Nicola Sturgeon hands Scottish football a yellow card and warns next time it will be a red #Bolingoli #nicolasturgeon pic.twitter.com/DUhDPpTYpu— The Daily Record (@Daily_Record) August 11, 2020
He infamously made an appearance in the brutal 1-0 loss at the Anthony Macaroni last season too!
Guess who is back for Celtic Boli Bolingoli has been handed a surprise start by Ange Postecoglou, can he take the chance against Livingston? ⬇️⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/u6Ae876Qjc pic.twitter.com/X1VfmtO1Gb— Daily Record Sport (@Record_Sport) September 19, 2021
Then weighed in with an assist for David Turnbull’s screamer against Motherwell at Fir Park. Here’s the goals from that game:
David Turnbull struck a glorious goal on his first appearance back at Fir Park for Celtic as the visitors beat Motherwell 2-0 pic.twitter.com/34JzlKKx99— Sky Sports Scotland (@ScotlandSky) October 16, 2021
He came, he worked a lot of people into a shoot and he left. Boli Bolingoli, thank you for your service and all the best, I suppose. TOMORROW: Banik Ostrava V Celtic - ‘reaction’ of sorts.

entry.title: Celtic settle for draw in 'friendly' against old foes Rapid Vienna as Ange Postecoglou's men step it up
entry.summary: IT didn’t quite have the needle of a certain previous meeting between these sides, and thankfully there were no bottles thrown from the crowd either, but Celtic needed a fair bit of bottle to come through this supposed friendly against Rapid Vienna with a hard-fought 3-3 draw.

entry.title: 3 Celtic pre-season talkers as Ange Postecoglou's side draw entertaining friendly against Rapid Vienna
entry.summary:
HART SHOWING WHY HE IS NUMBER ONE
Benjamin Siegrist moved to Celtic in the summer after being released from Dundee United, and as he signed on the dotted line at Parkhead, he confirmed that he would be giving his all to challenge Joe Hart for the No1 jersey. Going by today’s showing it certainly looks like Hart will be up for the fight after he pulled off a string of impressive saves. The former England international also showed his organisational qualities as he constantly communicated with the defence in front of him. Hart was a key performer last term, and he will need to continue to produce this season. He had a slight error in his 45-minute stint for Rapid Vienna’s first goal, but he will undoubtedly look to blame the slack back pass from Cameron Carter-Vickers.

entry.title: Mikey Johnston reveals Celtic Love Island obsession but ITV show is not for Ange Postecoglou
entry.summary: MIKEY JOHNSTON has revealed that the Celtic squad have been avid watchers of Love Island during this summer's pre-season training camp.

entry.title: Callum McGregor ditches Celtic protection mask for new season as skipper returns against Rapid Vienna
entry.summary: CALLUM MCGREGOR has ditched his protective face mask for the new season after returning today against Rapid Vienna.

entry.title: Celtic team news vs Rapid Vienna as Ange Postecoglou names strong starting XI
entry.summary: ANGE POSTECOGLOU has named his Celtic team to take on Rapid Vienna in pre-season.

entry.title: Celtic launch bid for St Mirren starlet Dylan Reid after Rangers reports
entry.summary: CELTIC have made a bid for St Mirren youngster Dylan Reid, according to reports.
